data.message: I don't care if I can't message people on my phone. I am NOT getting the messenger app. It just wastes space on my phone and is pointless! There is no reason to have an extra app just for messaging if the original facebook app could do that anyway. It's just a waste of space and is completely irritating. Pretty much the only thing I used my fb app for was messaging. Guess I'm just gonna delete it now. Thanks Facebook.

replies.message:
Then delete the Facebook app and install Messenger... it's a smaller app anyway. (It's actually very tiny, it takes up hardly any space at all) The messaging feature is much better in the app too. I've been using it since long before it was required.

You, and everyone else discussing this subject, is taking this way too far. They aren't asking for a kidney, life goes on with a separate messenging app.
